title: Apple exec explains why company will never release a product like Microsoft’s Surface Book
text:
Apple exec explains why company will never release a product like Microsoft’s Surface Book 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
Microsoft last week made a huge splash when it unveiled the Surface Book, a versatile laptop with a detachable 13.5-inch display. By all a...
